H0.text: No surgery needed is why closed reduction is simpler than open reduction in bone repair.

H1.text: No medicine needed is why closed reduction is simpler than open reduction in bone repair.

H2.text: No pain pills needed is a reason why closed reduction is simpler than open reduction in bone repair.

H3.text: No treatment needed is the reason why closed reduction is simpler than open reduction in bone repair.

A4.text: Closed reduction is when bone alignment is achieved from external manipulation of the bone without having to open the skin. This is not a surgical procedure.

A5.text: Closed reductions are most often done with the aid of multimodal pain medications, sedatives and/or local anesthesia.
